name: Yokozuna (itch)
description:
Entry for KO!! Slam-Jam

Choose your vehicle and throw your opponents out of the ring to rise up the ranks.

More vehicles and features coming soon.

Controls:

WASDArrowsArm/ForkSpaceRight ShiftBucketLeft ShiftRight Ctrl
